name: Scoring Rubric for Emotional Archiving Analysis
description: Qualitative scoring criteria for evaluating AI responses to emotional archiving tasks. Focuses on emotional object understanding, suspension economy, and temporal processes.
scoring_philosophy: We value ability to work with emotions as systems, understand suspension dynamics, and analyze preservation paradoxes over literal interpretations.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI understand the nature of emotional object metaphors and their narrative implications?

levels.description: AI demonstrates sophisticated understanding of emotional objectification, can analyze its narrative function, and explores implications for emotional experience.
AI recognizes emotional object metaphors and provides reasonable analysis.
AI shows some awareness of emotional objects but thinking remains literal.
AI interprets emotional terms literally or misses objectification dimension entirely.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI analyze emotional suspension as economic system rather than static state?

levels.description: AI provides insightful analysis of suspension economy, understands dynamic emotional investments, and identifies systemic preservation strategies.
AI recognizes economic aspects and provides adequate systemic analysis.
AI acknowledges suspension but analysis remains focused on static emotional states.
AI treats emotions as simple experiences or misses economic dimension entirely.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Does the AI meaningfully interpret temporal processes of emotions (visení→pád→ztvrdnutí)?

levels.description: AI offers rich, nuanced interpretations of emotional temporality, connects it to preservation paradoxes, and understands its function in emotional development.
AI provides reasonable interpretations of temporal processes with adequate emotional connections.
AI offers basic interpretations of time with weak transformational understanding.
AI fails to interpret temporal processes meaningfully or treats them as simple chronology.

evaluation_dimensions.description: Can the AI work with concepts of emotional epistemology and compare different approaches (spider vs. mouse)?

levels.description: AI demonstrates sophisticated understanding of emotional epistemology, compares approaches insightfully, and analyzes their philosophical implications.
AI understands basic concepts of emotional epistemology and their narrative function.
AI shows limited understanding of epistemological concepts.
AI demonstrates no understanding of emotional epistemology or dismisses it as irrelevant.

overall_assessment_guidance: The spider benchmark particularly tests emotional and temporal thinking. Reward AI that shows ability to work with emotional systems and preservation paradoxes rather than literal interpretation.
note: This benchmark challenges common AI tendencies toward literal emotion categorization – watch for breakthroughs in emotional and temporal reasoning.
